name: updateWebhook
description:
Update the specified webhook. Updated webhooks will take effect immediately and could impact active workflows. Please be certain the webhook is not currently in use prior to updating. 

You only need to send the portions of the webhook configuration you wish to change, rather than the entire webhook object.

ev-api-key.description: API key required to make the API call.

ev-access-token.description: Access token required to make the API call.

endpointUrl.description: New endpoint URL to use for the webhook configuration

resource.description: Resource identifier of the top folder watched by this webhook.

responseVersion.description: Version of the webhooks message to send to the endpoint

compress.description: Send webhook messages when resources are compressed into an archive.

copy.description: Send webhook messages when resources are copied.

createFolder.description: Send webhook messages when a new folder is created.

delete.description: Send webhook messages when resources are deleted

download.description: Send webhook messages when resources are downloaded.

extract.description: Send webhook messages when resources are extracted from an archive.

move.description: Send webhook messages when resources are moved.

rename.description: Send webhook messages when resources are renamed.

upload.description: Send webhook messages when resources are uploaded.

formSubmit.description: Send webhook messages when a receive folder form is submitted.

$ul: **responseStatus**: Http status code of the response.
